title: Nonbinary
description: "Nonbinary" is a new minicomic by Melanie Gillman (creator of As the Crow Flies.) It contains 16 pages of full-color, autobio comics about their process of coming out and living life as a person of nonbinary gender. Topics covered include: pronoun changes, dysphoria, dealing with reactions from friends/family/employers/etc., misconceptions about nonbinary people, and more.
author: Melanie Gillman
